plan.description: This layout establishes a central, unified 'Cozy Retreat' by placing the sofa directly at the foot of the bed, forming a large, comfortable lounging island. The work/dining area is neatly tucked to the side by the kitchenette, keeping the relaxation space distinct and maximizing the feeling of comfort upon entry.

furniture_placement.bed_1: Centered against the south wall, between the two windows (window_2 and window_3), directly opposite the entrance door.
furniture_placement.nightstand_1: Positioned to the left of the bed's headboard, against the south wall.
furniture_placement.nightstand_2: Positioned to the right of the bed's headboard, against the south wall.
furniture_placement.sofa_1: Placed at the foot of bed_1, facing the bed's headboard to create a single, unified lounging block in the center of the room.
furniture_placement.table_1: Set against the west wall, in the space south of the kitchen counter (kitchen_counter_1).
furniture_placement.chair_1: Pulled up to the east side of table_1, facing the west wall.
furniture_placement.chair_2: Pulled up to the south side of table_1, facing north.
furniture_placement.artwork_1: Mounted on the south wall, centered above the headboard of bed_1.
furniture_placement.artwork_2: Mounted on the west wall, centered above table_1.
furniture_placement.plant_1: Placed in the southeast corner of the room, next to nightstand_2.
furniture_placement.lamp_1: Positioned in the southwest corner of the room, providing light to the sofa and bed area.
furniture_placement.rug_1: Placed on the floor on the left side of the bed, partially under nightstand_1.
furniture_placement.rug_2: Placed on the floor on the right side of the bed, partially under nightstand_2.

plan.door_clearance: The main furniture is consolidated in the southern half of the room, leaving a clear, wide pathway from the entrance door (door_1) to the main living area and the bathroom.

zone_arrangement.work_zone: Located along the west wall, adjacent to the kitchenette, creating a distinct area for dining or work.
zone_arrangement.sleep_zone: Anchored on the south wall, opposite the entrance, making the bed the central feature of the room.
zone_arrangement.living_zone: Integrated with the sleep zone in the center and southern portion of the room, with the sofa facing the bed to form a cohesive relaxation area.
